title: What piece of technology can push to a smartphone, natively, just by coming into close proximity with it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Have you tried NFC Tags? You can store data on the tags such as a URL, contact information, text, and more. As long as the NFC phone is out of the lock screen, when it comes into close contact with the NFC Tag or touches the tag, the phone will open up the URL or display the contact information, etc. No special App is needed, only the NFC hardware.You can find NFC tags at http://www.buynfctags.com.
